item.title: The Code
item.description: Init the code We start with public void we don’t wish to alarm people var fileDialog = new System.Windows.Forms.OpenFileDialog(); fileDialog.Filter = "Image files (*.jpg)|*.jpg|All files (*.*)|*.*"; var result = fileDialog.ShowDialog(); switch (result) { case System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult.OK: var file = fileDialog.FileName; TxtImgFile.Text = file; TxtImgFile.ToolTip = file; break; case System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult.Cancel: default: TxtImgFile.Text = null; TxtImgFile.ToolTip = null; break; } Testing the code function uuid() { function randomDigit() { if (crypto && crypto.
